thread.title: LOVE THE TUSCANY!
thread.title_full: LOVE THE TUSCANY! - Review of The Tuscany - A St Giles Signature Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jessica F
title: LOVE THE TUSCANY!
text: Had a great stay at The Tuscany, the hotel is so pretty. The staff was so nice and accommodating and most importantly the room was very very clean and spacious. Also, the products in the bathroom were awesome - very high quality, also larger bottles compared to other hotels I've stayed at. Loved the facilities as well, I used the gym both days I was there - also VERY clean. And the bed was super comfortable too. Can't say anything negative about my experience. I would definitely stay there again!
